CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ibotta is a performance marketing platform allowing brands to deliver digital promotions to hundreds of millions of consumers through a network of publishers called the Ibotta Performance Network (IPN). Founded in 2011, Ibotta has credited American consumers with over $1.
